title: Is the 2020 Nagorno-Karabakh War, the first to utilize drone warfare by both belligerents (Armenia and Azerbaijan)? - Quora

response.answer_text: In 2016 they had a limited conflict and drones were used very limited by Azerbaijan. This is turning to a full scale war and Azerbaijan has been using drones heavily. Drones are cheap, don't have a pilot and if shot down there is no major loss. Armenia’s defense strategy is air defense, Missiles AA guns, etc. Azeri Strategy is to find them and destroy them via drones as those are hard to find on radar.
